sources.title: Sally Sargent (1968)
sources.description: Sally Sargent, the high school girl and secret agent, and Boris Bartok, the monster movie actor, are in danger of the revenge-seeking gangster, Rico Stark. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/sally-sargent-1968/
